item.title: About Me
item.description: I’m Cole, 21-year old. I lived in Beijing, China with my mom, a whole bunch of digital products, and all of my memories in this old but lovely house. More Info I consider myself a geeky person, but I don’t want to define my future as a programmer in some traditional sense. After all, my major is not CS either. I just keep trying what I’m fond of in any realms I’m interested in.

item.title: Running Pentaho Data Integration on Mac bigSur (M1)
item.description: 关于在M1 Mac 上安装部署PDI(kettle) 前言 截止我编写这篇笔记之时，Kettle并没有原生支持M1，所以本文大致思路是使用Rosetta
